citizen.action: Submits building permit with MitID login. System automatically retrieves CPR data and validates building address via DAWA.

caseworker.action: Receives notification via Digital Post. Reviews application, creates case in SBSYS and assigns to technical reviewer.

technical.action: Assesses building plans and compliance with building regulations. Approves or requests changes.

approval.action: Upon approval, permit is sent as PDF via Digital Post. Citizen receives real-time status updates.
